mean_cn: n. 坚持细节的人，顽固的人，费解的事物
mean_en: a person who believes that something is very important and should be done or followed all the time
sentence: He has always been quite a stickler for rules and has never changed.
sentence_trans: 他是个不知变通的人，只知道按规矩行事。
word_etyma: stickl=stickle坚持己见 ＋ er名词后缀 → stickler顽固的人
